# Reachwalker's Wariness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level: [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]]**, [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** 30-ft.-radius spherical emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 189

When this spell is in effect, you are instantly aware of the exact position of any aberration within the spellâ€™s area, as if you had blindsense with respect to aberrations only. 

*Special:* Shifter spellcasters cast this spell at +1 caster level.
